Content.Text:
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Have you eaten
breakfast? You won't have enough energy
for the day if you don't eat breakfast.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Hmm?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You smell like something delicious. Ah,
I know what this smell is. You must have
had a good breakfast today.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope you're having a good morning,
<MYNAME>. Let's do our best today!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Have you had lunch yet?
<PAGE>
You should eat three meals a day if you
want to be healthy, you know.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Have you decided what
you're going to have for dinner tonight?
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What about me? Oh, I asked Clement to
prepare a special meal for me.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Around this time you can
smell the food that people are eating in
their homes.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Have you eaten dinner?
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It's very important to eat and sleep
well so that you'll be able to work hard
again tomorrow.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I was just
deciding on what to eat tomorrow.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh, by the way, <MYNAME>, are you more of
a fan or rice or fan of bread?
Personally, I love them both!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I get sleepy
rather quickly at night. I've got to
work hard again tomorrow... Yawn.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Good morning. Hmm, <MYNAME>, somehow
seeing your face makes me feel less
motivated.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Recently, just
being able to see your face every day
really cheers me up!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You should come
have breakfast at the restaurant now and
again! Okay?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, <MYNAME>... I can't say I want to talk
to you right now. Please stay away.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Are you going to make any
snacks today?
<PAGE>
I'll be glad to taste test them for you
anytime!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Tee-hee, it's good to see
you again today.<RED>∀</RED> I'm happy you're
here!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, now's a not a good time. I was
thinking of a new recipe. Stop talking
to me. It's distracting!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED> Were you able to harvest
something tasty today? I'd be delighted
if you'd share it with me.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>! What did you eat today?
Let's share our delicious memories!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sigh... I thought married life would be
more enjoyable...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You're looking
handsome again today. Am I being too
lovey-dovey for the morning?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Give it your all
again today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What? Me? Of course I'll be working hard
today too.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, <MYNAME>. I haven't been feeling
motivated lately. I just don't know
what's wrong with me...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED> You finally talked to me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You didn't talk to me in the morning, so
I thought maybe I'd done something
wrong. I'm glad everything's okay.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED> I want to have dinner
together tonight. I'll be waiting for
you, okay?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You've worked hard today, <MYNAME>. As a
reward, I'll pet you on the head later
on.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED> I've been waiting for you
to say something to me ever since
you didn't talk to me this morning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Is something bothering you? I may not be
much help, but if you're feeling down,
please talk to me about it.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. Isn't this warm weather
wonderful?
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Going out for a picnic on a day like
this would make lunch that much
more delicious.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
... Ahchoo! Ah, I just sneezed. Even
though it's spring, the rain is still
cold.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ahhh. This heat has had me feeling
exhausted ever since the day started. I
could really go for a cold sherbet...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I can't stand this wet weather! I just
did my hair, but this humidity is making
it all frizzy.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't this sunny fall weather wonderful?
It makes a lot of cooking ingredients
look even more delicious than usual.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>And the fall menu at the restaurant
looks very tasty too.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please be sure to stay warm so that you
don't get sick in this rainy, cold
weather we're having.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's very cold today, isn't it? Going
outside makes my hands numb to the point
where I can barely move them.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Don't you think snow looks like cotton
candy? Oh? You don't?
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I have a habit of comparing everything
to food. Do you think that's strange?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is the farm going to be all right in
this weather?
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I worry about your crops getting blown
away.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is the farm going to be all right in
this weather?
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I heard that vegetables are sweeter when
they ripen in the snow, but I'm still a
little worried.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
While I am worried about the crops, I'm
also worried about you, <MYNAME>... 
Don't get hurt out there, okay?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
While I am worried about the crops, I'm
also worried about you, <MYNAME>... 
Don't get hurt out there, okay?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>. I heard the news.
Tee-hee.
<PAGE>
You started going out with someone,
right? I'm jealous! I'm sure you two
will be happy together.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I heard that you had a baby.
Congratulations!
<PAGE>
I love babies. It would be great to go
see yours sometime soon.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The forest is a treasure trove of
ingredients.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>You can only get walnuts and blueberries
when they're in season, but they're full
of nutrients and very good for you!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sometimes I bring back ingredients from
the forest and have Clement prepare them
for me.
<PAGE>
Clement is truly a first-class chef! No
matter what I bring, he always makes
something delicious!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you think the fish from this river
are delicious? The meat is firm, and it
has just the right texture.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>They're nutritious and good for you too.
They taste great grilled, and they're
just as good in stews and with rice.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you fishing here today? If you catch
a lot of fish, please share some with me
too.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I like climbing mountains, but the air
up here is thin, and sometimes I feel
light headed.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like the water around here. It tastes
fantastic. It's also good for your skin.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love the smell of the earth here. I'm
sure this is a great place for growing
crops.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, by the way... Did you harvest any
crops today?
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, umm, I was just thinking that it
would be nice to taste test some fresh
ingredients... If I can't, that's okay.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I guess there's nothing to eat down
here. If only there were an underground
lake...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ahhh!
<PAGE>
Listen to how much my voice echoes. How
fun!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
There aren't many people in this town. I
hope more people move here so we can get
more customers at the restaurant.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The town has become much livelier.
Seeing more and more life flow into this
place makes me happy.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There sure are many more people now than
when I first came here.
<PAGE>
I'm also happy that we have lots of
regular customers at the restaurant
now.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's fantastic that the town has been
revived. I think it's become a very
wonderful place.
<PAGE>
I'll do everything I can to help you
make sure that this town stays as lively
as it is now!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm happiest when I'm thinking about
food.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm not just talking about eating, but
also finding out where the ingredients
are made and how the food is prepared.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like reading cookbooks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Even if I can't travel all over the
world or back to the past, I can learn
about places by reading cookbooks!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm very happy when people who come to
the restaurant look like they're
enjoying the food.
<PAGE>
Of course, it's not like I made it, but
I did help create an environment for
people to enjoy it in.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tina is my sweets buddy. We eat tasty
deserts together and tell each other
about the sweets in different regions.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I eat a meal, I get a sense of the
personality and feelings of the person
who prepared it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I enjoy it because it's like that
person's experiences, feelings, and life
are packed into the flavor of the food.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was ten years old, my parents
told me that I needed to pay for my own
food, so I started working part-time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I've worked at many restaurants and seen
many types of food, so I'm grateful to
my parents for making me get a job.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you're a very, very important
friend to me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>I want to be friends with you forever,
okay? I truly like you.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Please don't talk to me, <MYNAME>. Just
looking at you makes me lose my
appetite...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I always thought that you were my
prince, <MYNAME>. But now you're more like
a tyrant!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now that we're a couple, I can ask for
all the attention from you that I want,
right?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Recently, one of my customers said that
you and I are a good match, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>I was a little embarrassed, but it also
made me very happy.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Recently, Clement said to me, "You look
even more beautiful lately."
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What?! You think so too, <MYNAME>? Ha ha
ha. I'm so happy!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you're handsome, good at
cooking, and kind. You really are my
prince.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, just seeing you makes me smile.
I'm madly in love with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>Let's always be this in love with each
other forever.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I've stopped expecting anything from
you, <MYNAME>. I'm going to do what I can
to have fun on my own!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I haven't felt much affection from you
recently, <MYNAME>... Please show me that
you care about me.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Lately, I've been having these dreams
where you disappear. So now I'm a little
afraid to sleep at night...
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Um, <MYNAME>, please don't go anywhere,
okay? I want you to stay by my side
forever...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks to you, every day I get to eat
delicious food made with delicious
ingredients.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You fill every day with joy. I find
myself thinking that I should have
married you sooner.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Work is fun and housework actually isn't
bad at all either.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I enjoy doing housework because I know
it'll make you happy, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It's wonderful living with the person
you love. We get to be lovey-dovey all
day long.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It's kind of funny for me to be saying
this, but I feel very loved by you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Of course, I love you right back. Let's
always be this madly in love with each
other.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When I told Clement that you and I are
going out, he was very happy for us.
<PAGE>
I was glad to see how happy he was. I
was so moved myself when I told him the
news that I started crying

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't worry too much about the fact that
we broke up. Let's try to stay close
friends.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm happy to be able to go out with you
again. It seems that the two of us are
tied together by fate.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I'm looking forward to wearing
my wedding dress, but I also can't wait
to see you in your tuxedo, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Tee-hee. Hey, honey...<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I always wanted to try calling you that.
Do I sound like a new wife?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard that newly pregnant women often
lose a lot of their appetites. But I'm
happy to say mine is still healthy!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was just talking to our baby.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hello, baby. This is your daddy. Don't
you think he's handsome?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Soon it won't be just the two of us
anymore...
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Even after our baby is born, please give
me the attention I need, okay? Otherwise
I'll probably get jealous of the baby.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Tee-hee. Hi, Daddy...<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I always wanted to try calling you that.
Do I sound like a mother?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Babies are so cute when they crawl. The
way they wobble around is just so
adorable.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> has learned how to say "I love
you mama.<RED>∀</RED>" Oh boy, I'm in love.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing <CHILD_NAME> all grown up...It
almost brings tears to my eyes.
<PAGE>
It'll take a lot of time, but I want to
raise <CHILD_NAME> to be on the inside as good
as how <CHILD_NAME> looks on the outside.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! It's angler fish stew! This is my
favorite food.<RED>∀</RED> Thank you so much!
<PAGE>
The harmony between the broth packed
with angler fish flavor, the tender
fish, and the thick liver is to die for.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, it's a <ITEMNAME0>! I love
this so much that I see it in my dreams.
I'm going to eat this as soon as I can!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love this! Its aroma is like heaven!
Thank you very much.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tee-hee... Is this for me? I'll gladly
accept it. Thank you very much.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Get it away! I hate this... It's very
mean of you to give me this as a
present!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Yuck! Get it away! I hate this... It's
very mean of you to give me this
as a present!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Yuck! Get it away! Why are you giving me
milk? I can't stand milk! Please take
it back with you!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my! This <ITEMNAME0> is impressive.
<PAGE>
This could be used to make a lot of
food.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my! I'm so impressed that you grew
this <ITEMNAME0>!
<PAGE>
With this, we can make a full course of
<ITEMNAME0> dishes.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'd feel bad taking a present from you
now. Don't worry about me...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't want this now... Please use it
yourself.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't want this now... Please use it
yourself.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
One present a day is enough. Please
bring me something again some other
time.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I appreciate the sentiment, but one
present a day is enough.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I appreciate the sentiment, but one
present a day is enough.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I-I'm so touched! You remembered my
birthday! Thank you so much!
<PAGE>
A-And, you got me angler fish stew.<RED>∀</RED>
I'll never forget this day for as long
as I live!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? I'm so happy! I wish
every day were my birthday.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You got me this <ITEMNAME0> for my
birthday?! It's just great! Thank you
very much!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
No matter how old I get, I always like
receiving birthday presents! Thank you
very much.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
How could you got me this <ITEMNAME0>
for my birthday?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You call this a birthday present? But I
hate this, you know. I think I'm going
to cry...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Why are you giving me milk on my
birthday?! Stop picking on me like
that!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, look at this <ITEMNAME0>!
You must have worked extra hard on it
for my birthday.
<PAGE>
I'm going to be able to eat birthday
food made with this until I'm stuffed!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so lucky to be getting this
<ITEMNAME0> for my birthday!
<PAGE>
I'm so happy that I'm going to go show
this to everyone later on. Thank you
so much.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This little chick is so cute! Those
beady eyes are simply irresistible.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, a chicken. It'd be wonderful to see
the eggs that she's laid too.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, what a large chicken. Please keep
laying lots and lots of delicious eggs,
okay?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This small doggy has a wonderful coat of
fur. It feels very nice.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This doggy is chubby yet is still
pretty small. How cute.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey big doggy, help out with the farm
work, okay?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
On top of being big overall, this dog is
fat. Overeating isn't healthy, you know!
Try to limit what this doggy eats, okay?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The way this kitty meows is so cute.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've been eating too much kitty. If
you don't go on a little diet, your
belly's going to look unsightly.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The long fur on this kitty looks very
soft. I want to rub my face in it.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
While fluffy, this cat is also a fatty.
Overeating isn't good for one's health.
Try to limit what this kitty eats, okay?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, today is the Flower Festival,
isn't it? Thank you very much.
<PAGE>
I'll be sure to take good care of these
flowers so they don't dry out.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It feels wonderful to get flowers from
my boyfriend. I almost feel like I'm
being proposed to.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah! I completely forgot that today is
the Flower Festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Thank you very much. Next year I'll
also prepare some flowers to give to
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tee-hee. I've actually been looking
forward to this ever since yesterday.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I appreciate this a lot. Thank you very
much.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tee-hee. Harmony Day is the day that I
look forward to the most after my
birthday.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh, this looks delicious! Did you make
this yourself, <MYNAME>? I'm already
looking forward to next year!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tee-hee. I've been waiting and waiting
for this moment since yesterday. Thank
you very much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>These sweets are full of your love,
so I'm sure they'll taste twice as
delicious!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah! These are Pumpkin Festival sweets.
I've seen the children getting some and
was hoping someone would give me some.
<PAGE>
Thank you very much. You're a very nice
person, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
... These are  Pumpkin Festival sweets,
right? I had a feeling you'd give me
some.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>They look delicious. Thank you very
much, <MYNAME>!
